title: What Does Off-Season Look Like For a Pro Cyclist?
content:
We talked to Matej Mohorič, Christopher Blevins, Lauren De Crescenzo, and Sofia Gomez Villafañe about their time off the bike: turns out, they enjoy the time more than you'd expect.

Read the full article at What Does Off-Season Look Like For a Pro Cyclist? on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
